import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Container, Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { GlobalContext } from '../hooks/GlobalContext' const Header = () => { const { setUser, user } = useContext(GlobalContext) const logoutHandler = () => setUser('') return (
{user ? ( {user.name} Profile Logout ) : ( Login )} About
) } export default Header
